Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server.networkmanager

Class ClientHandlerListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server.networkmanager.ClientHandlerListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientHandlerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
The server's message listener for a certain player.. Waits for messages from the client, and when one arrives, notifies its observers to complete some action. If detects a connection lost, stops from listening messages and put the message sender of the same player in shutdown mode.

    • waitForMessages

      public void waitForMessages() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Wait for a message from the client and do different actions depending to the type of the message: A String is a setup message. When received, asks to process the nickname or the game-mode, depending on the setup phase; A PingMessage means that the client is still alive; schedules a reply in 5 seconds; a NetworkMessageToServer is some action from the player; notifies the view to process the action.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something is wrong with connection
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if is received an unexpected class

    • setGameMode

      public void setGameMode​(boolean value)
      Changes the setup phase status, precisely if the game mode have been set
      Parameters:
      value - true if the game mode has been set

    • setClosed

      public void setClosed()
      Used by the first listener when the player is out the game, to avoid the destruction of the game room when it mustn't be destroyed

    • setUploader

      public void setUploader​(ClientHandler h)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      h - the handler that sends messages to the client

    • processNickname

      public void processNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Process the player's nickname. Verify if it's available, and notify the result to the client
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player

    • processGameMode

      public void processGameMode​(java.lang.String gameMode)
      Process the game mode chosen by the player. If the player sent a wrong message, notify it of the problem, otherwise add it in a game room.
      Parameters:
      gameMode - the game mode sent by the player
